messages.content: Alice Smith: Hey everyone! What's the plan for this weekend?
I was thinking maybe we could check out that new Italian place downtown

Carol Williams: Ooh yes! I heard they have amazing homemade pasta
Alice Smith: That sounds perfect! What time works for you guys?
Bob Johnson: Saturday evening? Maybe around 7?
Carol Williams: Works for me! Should we make a reservation?
Alice Smith: I'll call them and book a table for 3
You're the best Alice

Alice Smith: Lol someone has to keep this group together!
Bob Johnson: So did anyone watch the game last night?
Carol Williams: No I missed it! What happened?
Bob Johnson: It was INSANE. They came back from a 20 point deficit in the last quarter
Alice Smith: Wait seriously? I turned it off early because I thought it was over
Yeah you missed the best part! The crowd was going absolutely wild

Carol Williams: So I have some news... I got the promotion!
Alice Smith: OMG CAROL!!! That's amazing!!! ðŸŽ‰
Bob Johnson: Congrats!! You totally deserve it
Carol Williams: Thanks guys! I'm so excited but also kind of nervous
Alice Smith: You're going to crush it, don't even worry
We definitely need to celebrate this at dinner on Saturday now

Carol Williams: Aww you guys are the sweetest
Alice Smith: Should we invite anyone else? What about Mike?
Bob Johnson: Good idea, I'll text him
Carol Williams: The more the merrier!
Alice Smith: Good morning! How's everyone doing today?
Tired. Stayed up way too late watching documentaries

Alice Smith: Oh I've heard of that! Is it good?
Bob Johnson: So good. The cinematography is incredible
Carol Williams: Adding it to my list!
Alice Smith: Lunch break! Anyone else starving?
Carol Williams: Same! I forgot to pack lunch today
There's a great taco truck near my office if you're ever in the area

Alice Smith: Ooh tacos sound amazing right now
Carol Williams: Everything sounds amazing when you're hungry lol
Bob Johnson: Just got confirmation from Mike, he's in for Saturday!
Alice Smith: Perfect! I'll update the reservation to 4 people
Carol Williams: This is going to be so fun
Should we do anything after dinner?

Carol Williams: I love comedy shows! Let's do it
Bob Johnson: Count me in. Who's performing?
Alice Smith: Some local comedians I think, but the reviews are really good
Carol Williams: Supporting local talent, I'm here for it
Carol Williams: Random question - does anyone know a good mechanic?
What happened to your car?

Carol Williams: Oh that would be great! Can you send me the address?
Alice Smith: Sure! It's called Smith Auto Repair, 425 Main St
Bob Johnson: Is that the place with the big red sign?
Alice Smith: Yeah that's it!
Carol Williams: Perfect, I'll take it there tomorrow. Thanks Alice!
Just tried that new coffee place everyone's been talking about

Bob Johnson: Yes! The lavender latte is incredible
Carol Williams: Lavender latte? That sounds so fancy
Bob Johnson: It's actually really good, not too sweet either
Alice Smith: I need to try that. I'm obsessed with lavender everything
Carol Williams: We should go there together sometime!
Coffee date after our Saturday dinner?
